titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2828) to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to implement water supply technology and infrastructure programs aimed at increasing and diversifying domestic water resources.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-592, by Mr. Hastings (WA).

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2828 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be considered read. A specified amendment is in order.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 201.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 711.
Mr. Hastings (WA) moved to table the appeal of the ruling of the Chair.
On motion to table the appeal of the ruling of the Chair Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 197 - 165 (Roll no. 348).
DEBATE - The House resumed debate on H. Res. 711.
DEBATE - The House resumed debate on H. Res. 711.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by recorded vote: 216 - 180 (Roll no. 350).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 237 - 158 (Roll no. 351).

bill.summary: 7/9/2004--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2828) to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to implement water supply technology and infrastructure programs aimed at increasing and diversifying domestic water resources.
